channel.title: CVE Feed for IDAttend Pty Ltd -- IDWeb
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IDAttend Pty Ltd -- IDWeb

item.title: CVE-2023-27255|2024-09-11T13:14:47.434Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Unauthenticated SQL injection in the DeleteRoomChanges method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows extraction or modification of all data by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-26583|2024-09-11T13:50:30.744Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Unauthenticated SQL injection in the GetCurrentPeriod method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows extraction or modification of all data by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-27258|2024-09-11T13:11:32.294Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Missing authentication in the GetStudentGroupStudents method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows retrieval of student and teacher data by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-27377|2024-09-11T13:10:33.385Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Missing authentication in the StudentPopupDetails_EmergencyContactDetails method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows extraction of sensitive student data by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-26580|2024-09-11T13:13:19.807Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Unauthenticated arbitrary file read in the IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.013 allows the retrieval of any file present on the web server by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-26582|2024-09-11T13:51:10.980Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Unauthenticated SQL injection in the GetExcursionDetails method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows extraction or modification of all data by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-27256|2024-09-11T13:12:06.009Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Missing authentication in the GetLogFiles method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows retrieval of sensitive log files by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-27257|2024-09-11T13:11:45.364Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Missing authentication in the GetActiveToiletPasses method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows retrieval of student information by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-27259|2024-09-11T13:11:22.288Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Missing authentication in the GetAssignmentsDue method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows extraction of sensitive student and teacher data by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-27254|2024-09-11T13:14:28.360Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Unauthenticated SQL injection in the GetRoomChanges method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows extraction or modification of all data by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-26579|2024-09-11T13:13:43.059Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Missing authentication in the DeleteStaff method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.013 allows deletion of staff information by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-26568|2024-09-11T13:15:15.269Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Unauthenticated SQL injection in the GetStudentGroupStudents method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows extraction or modification of all data by unauthenticated attackers.
